{{Description|When you return to [[Mt. Aocang]], a mysterious teapot domain appears before you and [[Paimon]]. Once inside, you are somehow able to control the [[Onikabuto]]-shaped gardening machine "Bloom Pruner" and face off against foes that defy common sense...}}
'''Shuyu's Baffling Beetle Battle Bowl''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 5.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2025/01/03 10:00 - 2025/01/13 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above
* Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]]: Act III "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"
* Complete the Story Quest "[[Grus Serena Chapter]]: Act I" first to get the best experience from this event.

===Summary===
* From the first day of the event, a new beetle battle challenge will unlock every day. A total of five challenges will be unlocked. Take on your opponents and achieve corresponding criteria to obtain [[Primogem]]s, [[Sanctifying Unction]], [[Hero's Wit]], and other rewards.
* There are 3 levels of difficulty in each beetle battle challenge: Friendly Spar, Focused Fight, and Utmost Might. After the challenge begins, Friendly Spar and Focused Fight difficulties will be unlocked. Utmost Might can only be unlocked after successfully challenging Focused Fight.
* Take on your opponents and achieve corresponding criteria to claim rewards in the event page. By completing challenges on a higher difficulty setting, you can directly claim rewards at lower difficulties as well.

===Tutorial===
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Shuyu's Baffling Beetle Battle Bowl 1.png
|text1  = You can enter "Shuyu's Baffling Beetle Battle Bowl" through a wondrous adeptal teapot, and challenge the mighty foes within alongside Bloom Pruner!
|image2 = Tutorial Shuyu's Baffling Beetle Battle Bowl 2.png
|text2  = Pay attention to the relative positions of Bloom Pruner and its foe at all times! A firm grasp of distancing and the tempo of movement will allow you to dodge opposing attacks, unleash moves of your own, and claim victory!
|image3 = Tutorial Shuyu's Baffling Beetle Battle Bowl 3.png
|text3  = In two-player Co-Op mode, you can invite one player in your team or matchmake with another player to challenge powerful foes together.
|image4 = Tutorial Shuyu's Baffling Beetle Battle Bowl 4.png
|text4  = Pressing the Forward button will instruct Bloom Pruner to spend a small amount of Stamina to move forward {{Color|help|half a tile}}.<br>Pressing the Back button will expend a fixed amount of Stamina to retreat {{Color|help|1 tile}} to dodge opposing attacks.
|image5 = Tutorial Shuyu's Baffling Beetle Battle Bowl 5.png
|text5  = Hold the Forward Button to instruct the onikabuto to charge up, and when you stop charging, it will dash forward. A complete charge will allow it to dash forward {{Color|help|2 tiles}}.<br>If, on completion of a dash, the Onikabuto's end point {{Color|help|coincides perfectly with its opponent's position}} and it hits them, it can perform a {{Color|help|Piercing Strike}}, dealing greater DMG.
|image6 = Tutorial Shuyu's Baffling Beetle Battle Bowl 6.png
|text6  = Hold the Jump button to direct the onikabuto to perform consecutive jumps and dodge ground-bound attacks.<br>You can also hold the Forward button in mid-air to attack opponents' higher-up {{Color|help|weak spots}}, dealing greater DMG.<br>In difficulties other than "Utmost Might," an {{Color|help|Aim Line}} will indicate the {{Color|help|distance}} over which you will attack when charging up in mid-air.
}}

==Stages==
{{Description|A peculiar Domain that harnesses similar principles to the [[Serenitea Pot]] and has been modified by [[Cloud Retainer]]. Venture inside and you can command your old nemesis, Bloom Pruner, to take on simulated monsters that might prove too powerful for an ordinary [[Onikabuto]] to challenge...|Map Marker Description}}

===Tutorial - "Let's Start by Trying to Command Our Former Rival..."===
Unlocks 2024-01-03 10{{Colon}}00

# {{Control|Tap to command|{{Key|D}} Press D to command|{{Key|ps-r2}} button: Command}} the Onikabuto to move forward
# {{Control|Tap to command|{{Key|A}} Press A to command|{{Key|ps-l2}} button: Command}} the Onikabuto to dodge backward
# {{Control|Hold to command|{{Key|D}} Hold D to command|{{Key|ps-r2}} button: Command}} the Onikabuto to begin charging
# At the current distance, charge up to a certain level to rush forward. Reach your opponent's exact location to strike them and unleash the Charged Attack "Piercing Strike"
# {{Control|Hold to command|{{Key|W}} Hold the W button to command|{{Key|ps-x}} button: Command}} the Onikabuto to float
# Rise up until level with the enemy's weak spot and initiate an aerial attack
# {{Control|Hold to command|{{Key|D}} Hold the D button to command|{{Key|ps-r2}} button: Command}} the Onikabuto to begin an airborne Charged Attack
# If the rush distance brings you into contact with your opponent, you can unleash a Charged Attack "Piercing Strike"
# The right charge level has been reached, stop holding to unleash Charged Attack "Piercing Strike"
